events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Senior Software Engineer position and have logged it into our recruitment tracking system.
The application was categorized under Engineering after reviewing the candidate's background in software development and relevant skills.
Recruiter Alice has been assigned to this case to handle communications and schedule interviews with the candidate.
Completed initial phone screening where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and problem-solving abilities.
Received prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview was scheduled for 2024-04-17 at 10:00 AM UTC with the engineering panel to assess coding and system design skills.
